description: Test cases for home screen functionality and session discovery features

test_cases.name: Display Nearby Sessions on Home Screen
test_cases.expected_result: Home screen displays nearby sessions with location indicator showing radius (e.g., 2 km radius) and result count

test_cases.name: Session Card Display Validation
steps: View session cards in the list
test_cases.expected_result: Each session card displays: sport icon, title, spots available, date/time, player count, skill level pill, venue type pill, distance

test_cases.name: Search Sessions by Keyword
test_cases.expected_result: Session list filtered to show only matching sessions

test_cases.name: Search Sessions by Player Name
steps: Enter player name in search field
test_cases.expected_result: Sessions hosted by or including that player are displayed

test_cases.name: Search with No Results
steps: Enter search term with no matching sessions
test_cases.expected_result: Empty state message displayed indicating no sessions found

test_cases.name: Join Session from Home Screen
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to session detail screen

test_cases.name: View Session Details from Home
steps: Click 'View' button on a session card
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to session detail screen

test_cases.name: Express Interest - I'll Play
steps: Click 'I'll Play' button on session card
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to propose session or join flow

test_cases.name: Navigate to Propose Session
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Propose Session screen

test_cases.name: Navigate to Map View
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Map View screen showing sessions on map

test_cases.name: Sessions Display Distance Correctly
test_cases.expected_result: Each session shows accurate distance from user (e.g., 0.55 km, 1.2 km)
